title: Looking for Jungle Silver to Gold starter for team
body:
Hello at the moment we are taking expression of interest for our team on the next series we enter which we will be running official trials for in the coming weeks. we do have criteria that we are searching for:

18+

4 nights per week of games with the team

Min 10 ranked games per week

Jng/mid roles

add on league or message on disc BerserkerFury#9450
